Updates the settings.
update() - Method in class wobani.example.FreeCameraComponent
This method allows the user to control camera movement and rotation the following ways: W - move forward, A - move left, S - move backward, D - move right, Q - turn left, E - turn right, SHIFT - boost movement speed.

updateSettingsWindowDimensions() - Method in class wobani.example.Example1Window
Updates the GLFW window's dimensions on the settings UI.

USE_GLOSSINESS - Static variable in class wobani.material.MaterialSlot
Determines whether the shader use the specular map's or the specular color's alpha channel as a glossiness value.
USE_POM - Static variable in class wobani.material.MaterialSlot
Determines whether the shader use the normal map's alpha channel as a parallax map.
useBlinnPhongPipeline() - Static method in class wobani.rendering.RenderingPipeline
Sets the rendering pipeline to use the Blinn-Phong shading for rendering meshes, draw the splines with a single color, create shadow map and some post processing effects.
Utility - Class in wobani.toolbox
Useful static methods for logging, creating various matrices etc.
